org.seedstack.seed.web.spi

Class FilterDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.seed.web.spi.AbstractDefinition
      • org.seedstack.seed.web.spi.FilterDefinition

  • public class FilterDefinition
extends AbstractDefinition
    This class holds the full definition of a Servlet filter. It can be returned as a collection element from WebProvider.filters() to define the filters that must be registered by Seed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FilterDefinition.Mapping
      This class holds the definition of a filter mapping.

    • Method Detail

      • getFilterClass

        public Class<? extends javax.servlet.Filter> getFilterClass()
        Returns:
        the Servlet filter class.

      • getPriority

        public int getPriority()
        Returns:
        the registration priority of this filter (SeedFilterPriority.NORMAL by default).

      • setPriority

        public void setPriority(int priority)
        Sets the registration priority of this filter. Filters are registered in the order of increasing priority.
        Parameters:
        priority - the absolute priority of this filter.

      • getMappings

        public FilterDefinition.Mapping[] getMappings()
        Returns:
        the filter mappings.

      • addMappings

        public void addMappings(FilterDefinition.Mapping... mappings)
        Adds a mapping to this filter definition.
        Parameters:
        mappings - the mapping.
        See Also:
        FilterRegistration.addMappingForUrlPatterns(EnumSet, boolean, String...)

      • getServletMappings

        public FilterDefinition.Mapping[] getServletMappings()
        Returns:

        public void addServletMappings(FilterDefinition.Mapping... servletMappings)
        Adds a servlet mapping to this filter definition.
        Parameters:

        See Also:
